channel.title: CVE Feed for ZTE -- ZXIPTV-UCM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ZTE -- ZXIPTV-UCM

item.title: CVE-2017-10937|2024-08-05T17:50:12.810Z -- zte -- zxiptv-ucm
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in all versions prior to V2.01.05.09 of the ZTE ZXIPTV-UCM product allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the opertype parameter, resulting in the disclosure of database information.
